extendedInfo.description: *** Please email me with any issues ***A simple tea timer, works when the phone is sleeping. Can even be used to time things _other_ than tea!   Please email me with suggestions/comments! An open source effort: http://github.com/ralphleon/TeaTimer.In version 1.7:- Ability to stay awake (in settings)- Color themes

reviews.comment: Simple app with a modern feel and concise UI. Also has a nice alarm sound. Beautiful.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: It\'s a timer which really has nothing to do with tea. No presets for specific types of teas, so what\'s the point?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: help please?
reviews.comment: HELP tell how do get this alarm stop going on forevr? will not stop, @ all, may hav powr off fone evry time? should uninstall mayb?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I\'ve been using this timer through two phone upgrades and it is my first download. Simple and perfect.
reviews.author: Morgan Beadle

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: I use it for cooking, workouts, coloring my hair - everything! Thank you for a simple app with no hidden catches!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect.
reviews.comment: Simple and perfect. If you need bells and whistles look elsewhere.  But if you want a simple countdown timer, you couldn\'t ask for better.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: The sound notifications did not work properly when the screen was off. would be helpful to be able to enter in the time manually rather than scroll
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Pretty good. Could have one fewer click to set time,not auto select, allow to use system ringtones.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pretty much perfect
reviews.comment: Exactly what it says on the tin. No more, no less.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I love it does everything its supposed to so far. Awesome. I previously had the twotouchtimer and this is MUCH better, no comparison. Samsung moment.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works even when phone sleeps
reviews.comment: , which is good (I tried others, and their clock stopped running when the phone\'s screensaver started (and then beeped when I woke the phone)). Minor nitpick: The icon stays in the top bar after finishing, cluttering that bar (I have to drag it down, select it and press \"back\" again to make it go away). Since I depend on the bar for seeing three kinds of email, appointments and other stuff, I\'d love to eliminate everything that\'s not doing a job there.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Simple timer I use for special needs students. Visual representation of how much time they have left on their tasks. Would appreciate app2sd.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: A simple task, apparently, not so simple to make an app for
reviews.comment: I was looking for a simple tea timer app. Basically a stopwatch app with at least a tea theme. This app does that, but not without its struggles.  My issues with it are:  It is impossible to \"set timer\" when the phone is in landscape mode. Even though the app is open, it still drops a notification. I\'m right there! Looking at it! What is the need? When the \"set timer\" screen is pulled up(only works in portrait mode, remember), and the phone changes screen orientation, the timer is reset, or changed to a different time(haven\'t figured out the \"logic\" yet).  Overall, for a simple task, all I needed was a trustworthy stopwatch, and that\'s not what I get with this app. Might be good enough for some, but it is not for me.  I do believe these flaws are simple for the developer to fix.
reviews.author: Andr\303\251 Borda

reviews.title: Slightly Misleading
reviews.comment: Very simple to use. However, calling the app Tea Timer is a little misleading with no presets related to tea. Sometimes tedious to set with only +/- controls. None of the features make it stand out.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Would be nice to be able to set a duration for alarm to ring for.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: 4 stars! Excellent simple app! Please add an exit button for 5 stars :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Must unlock display to turn off alarm which can be very annoying. Nice simple app otherwise.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t remember preset
reviews.comment: Looks nice but i was looking for something close to a 1 touch timer. No point just duplicating the built in countdown timer. UnInstalled.
reviews.author: Michael Filgate

reviews.title: Pretty cool!
reviews.comment: Love it!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Works perfectly on my Galaxy Nexus.
reviews.author: A Google User
